title: Xbox & Bethesda Confirm Developer Showcase - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.11.23
description:
Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get Honey for free!

Blessing and Greg talk about what the Xbox & Bethesda Developer_Direct might look like, Naughty Dog changing up their style, and Oculus' creator digging PS VR 2.

Time Stamps:

00:00:00 - Start
00:03:45 - Housekeeping
The first episode of the year of The Blessing Show is up right now! If you don’t know, The Blessing Show is my video series where I break down what’s up in the gaming industry and this new episode is the first episode shot from the spare bedroom. Check it out and watch me recap 2022 on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.
The brand new PS I Love You XOXO and Xcast crossover episode is now available. It’s our video game fantasy draft where we pick teams of the best of the best video game releases of 2023. That’s up on both PS I Love You & Xcast podcast feeds and Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
The Roper Report   -
00:09:11 - Xbox and Bethesda officially confirm their Developer_Direct Livestream
00:22:02 - Big things are poppin over at Ubisoft
00:34:06 - Naughty Dog’s Neil Druckmann wants to focus less on cutscenes and ‘traditional narrative’
00:40:30 - Oculus Founder 'Blown Away' by Sony's PSVR2
00:47:26 - Final Fantasy 16 Producer Denies Existence of PC Version
00:49:59 - Simon Pegg is Playing the Headmaster Black in Hogwarts Legacy
00:52:04 - EA to Remove Madden NFL 23 CPR Touchdown Celebration Following Damar Hamlin Incident
00:54:35 - A new single-player MechWarrior game is in development
00:56:22 - Out today
00:59:22 - Squad Up: Ry Gillon - PS5 - MrNiceGuyRy47
00:59:56 - You‘re Wrong
